## Type
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Refactor

## Checklist
- [ ] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] `npm run test:ci` passes
- [ ] No new `@/components/` imports (use `@/design-system/` or `@/features/`)
- [ ] Layer rules respected (see ARCHITECTURE.md)
- [ ] New feature has barrel export (`index.ts`)
